Geo
========

  - The key abstract class is LinkSampler, which represents a terrain data structure that can be sampled. 
    The primary implemtation is DSMSampler, which represents real terrain data.

  - This submodule also contains classes for interpolating a DSM, estimating potential gateway locations, and plotting gateways.

  .. automodule:: iot_net_planner.geo.demand_grid
	:members:
  .. automodule:: iot_net_planner.geo.dsm_filler
	:members:
  .. automodule:: iot_net_planner.geo.dsm_sampler
	:members:
  .. automodule:: iot_net_planner.geo.estimate_facs
	:members:
  .. automodule:: iot_net_planner.geo.plotting
	:members:
  .. automodule:: iot_net_planner.geo.sampler
	:members:
  .. automodule:: iot_net_planner.geo.simplex_sampler
	:members:
